hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:when a fly alights in anyone’s vessel, he should plunge it all in, for in one of its wings there is a disease, and in the other is a cure. It prevents the wing of it is which there is a cure, so plunge it all in (the vessel)

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الذُّبَابِ يَقَعُ فِي الطَّعَامِ
chapter.eng-name: If a fly falls into the food
